S06n602:0: 11 98. buddhaṃ subhūti paripṛcchati vādicandraṃ kyantantarāyu bhaviṣyanti guṇe ratānām |
S06n602:1: bahu antarāyu bhaviṣyanti bhaṇāti śāsta tatu alpamātra parikīrtayiṣyāmi tāvat || 1 ||
S06n602:3: 99. pratibhāna neka vividhāni upapadyiṣyanti likhamāna prajña imu pāramitā jinānām |
S06n602:4: yuta śīghra vidyuta yathā parihāyiṣyanti akaritva artha jagatī imu mārakarma || 2 ||
S06n602:6: 100. kāṅkṣā ca keṣaci bhaviṣyati bhāṣamāṇe na mamātra nāma parikīrtitu nāyakena |
S06n602:7: na ca jāti bhūmi parikīrtitu nāpi gotraṃ na ca so śruṇiṣyati kṣipiṣyati mārakarma || 3 ||
S06n602:9: 101. evaṃ ta mūlamapahāya ajānamāno śākhāpalāśa parieṣayiṣyanti mūḍhāḥ |
S06n602:10: hastiṃ labhitva yatha hastipadaṃ gaveṣe tatha prajñapāramita śrutva sūtrānta eṣet || 4 ||
S06n602:12: 102. yatha bhojanaṃ śatarasaṃ labhiyāna kaścit mārgeṣu ṣaṣṭiku labhitva sa bhojanāgryam |
S06n602:17: 103. satkārakāma bhaviṣyanti ca lābhakāmāḥ sāpekṣacitta kulasaṃstavasaṃprayuktāḥ |
S06n602:18: choritva dharma kariṣyanti adharmakāryaṃ patha hitva utpathagatā ima mārakarma || 6 ||
S06n602:20: 104. ye cāpi tasmi samaye imu dharma śreṣṭhaṃ śruṇanāya chandika utpādayiṣyanti śraddhām |
S06n602:21: te dharmabhāṇaka viditvana kāryayuktaṃ premāpanīta gamiṣyanti sudurmanāśca || 7 ||
S06n602:23: 105. imi mārakarma bhaviṣyanti ya tasmi kāle anye ca neka vividhā bahu antarāyā |
S06n602:24: yehī samākulikṛtā bahu bhikṣu tatra prajñāya pāramita etu na dhārayanti || 8 ||
S06n602:26: 106. ye te bhavanti ratanā ya anarghaprāptā te durlabhā bahupratyarthika nityakālam |
S06n602:27: emeva prajñavarapāramitā jinānāṃ durlābhu dharmaratanaṃ baddupadravaṃ ca || 9 ||
S06n602:29: 107. navayānaprasthita sa sattva parīttabuddhiḥ ya imaṃ durlābhu dharmaratanaṃ parāpuṇanti |
S06n602:30: māro'tra utsuku bhaviṣyati antarāye buddhā daśaddiśi parigrahasaṃprayuktāḥ || 10 ||
